description: This scholarship was created in honor of Dr. Loree M. Rice, Professor Emerita of English. It is intended to assist an outstanding junior English Education major. Eligibility Requirements Enrolled in Bachelor of Arts in Education program Â– English Education Junior status Continuing student in the fall semester after the scholarship is awarded
